questions.question: What are Vector Images?

choices.answer: Made up of pixels and dots defined by mathematical objects
Made up of graphs and charts defined by mathematical objects
Made up of lines and curves defined by mathematical objects
Made up of colors and shapes defined by mathematical objects

questions.question: What is Kerning?

choices.answer: Imaginary line on which most letters in a typeface sit
The space between two characters
the space in between all lines
The space between all the characters

questions.question: What is Tracking?

choices.answer: The space between all characters
The imaginary line on which most letters in a typeface sit
The space between two characters
The space between all lines
